children.text: The floor truss in this area has been cut/damaged, which may cause a catastrophic failure of the floor truss system.
‘Under no circumstances should PosiTrusses be cut or modified in any way without prior approval from the truss fabricator’ .

The manufacturer must be immediately contacted to comment on the issue, and where needed, provide a rectification design solution to properly address this floor joist. The owners should request copies of the approval or rectification design from the floor truss manufacturer for their records.
